mapper.select: SELECT ssg.id, ssg.subjectId FROM student_subject_grade ssg WHERE ssg.id=#{userNumber};

SELECT student_subject_grade.*, subject.name subjectName FROM student_subject_grade JOIN subject ON student_subject_grade.subjectid = subject.id where student_subject_grade.id = '201232001' and student_subject_grade.completeType = '전공필수';

SELECT student_subject_grade.*, subject.name subjectName FROM student_subject_grade JOIN subject ON student_subject_grade.subjectid = subject.id where student_subject_grade.id = #{id} and (student_subject_grade.completeType = '전공필수' OR student_subject_grade.completeType = '전필');

SELECT ssg.*, s.name subjectName, s.subjectScore subjectScore FROM student_subject_grade ssg JOIN subject s ON ssg.subjectid = s.id where ssg.id = #{id} and (ssg.completeType = '교양필수' OR ssg.completeType= '교필');

SELECT ssg.id 학번, ssg.yearOfClass, ssg.yearOfSemester, ssg.subjectId, sub.subjectScore, ssg.grade, ssg.completeType FROM student_subject_grade ssg LEFT JOIN student s ON ssg.id = s.id LEFT JOIN subject sub ON ssg.subjectId = sub.id WHERE ssg.id = 201532002 and ssg.completeType LIKE CONCAT('복', '%') ORDER BY ssg.yearOfClass, ssg.yearOfSemester;
